name: 初級華語（二）
restrict: ◎限外籍生修習◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 本課程針對初級華語學習設計，本課程級別為A1-A2。
goals: 提升生口語表達及溝通互動之能力。
全面提升外籍學生的華語聽、說、讀、寫等各項技能。
syllabus:
Elementary Chinese for International Students (II)

Week 1 Lesson 12 How Long Will You Be Studying Chinese in Taiwan?

Week 2 Lesson 12 How Long Will You Be Studying Chinese in Taiwan?

Week 3 Lesson 12 How Long Will You Be Studying Chinese in Taiwan?

Week 4 Lesson 12 How Long Will You Be Studying Chinese in Taiwan?

Week 6 Lesson 13 Happy Birthday

Week 10 Lesson 14 It’s So Cold!
